SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_DIG_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_DIG_000_CUT_000_000.text:
There is something here.
Dig it up at once, Scarecrow.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_DIG_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_DIG_000_CUT_000_010.text: Don't need to tell me twice!

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_DIG_000_CUT_010_030.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_DIG_000_CUT_010_030.text:
I haven't the faintest idea what that is.
Perhaps we can make use of it.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_DIG_000_CUT_010_060.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_DIG_000_CUT_010_060.text: Mmm. So much for that idea.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_DIG06_SUCCESS_AIRSHIP_.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_DIG06_SUCCESS_AIRSHIP_.text:
It's saying something or other
about the sand's energy.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_DIG04_SUCCESS_WARSHIP_.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_DIG04_SUCCESS_WARSHIP_.text:
Apparently it'll keep the sand
from falling apart?

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_DIG00_SUCCESS_DIVING_0.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_DIG00_SUCCESS_DIVING_0.text:
Sounds like it'll keep the sand
from clumping together.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_DIG02_SUCCESS_FERRY_00.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_DIG02_SUCCESS_FERRY_00.text:
It's talking about the sand's
shifting ability.

SUB_W13_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_00.text:
I see naught but an ocean of sand,
with no doors to be found. Ah, but there looks to be wreckage
of some sort in the distance. Let us
make for this place with all speed.

SUB_W13_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_01.speaker: Ilmurran_Einherjar
SUB_W13_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_01.text: Sand and rubble, far as the eye can see... Is this wasteland really the Crowrealm? My atonement is incomplete, for I destroyed not just my village, but the world.

SUB_W13_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_02.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_02.text:
No rhymes, Warrior? Truly this place weighs
heavy on your soul. It is your world, then?

SUB_W13_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_03.speaker: Ilmurran_Einherjar
SUB_W13_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_03.text:
Yes. This is the Crowrealm, and it is where
I must make amends for my past.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
A ship in a sea of sand. Mmm.
Perhaps this was once a world of water,
but this vessel looks to have outlived
its purpose now.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Mmm? What is that thing with a bag over
its head, and why is it staring at me?

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
I haven't seen a human out this way in days.
Where exactly did you come from, anyway?
The airship? The cruise ship? The submarine?

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
I am Siugnas, the Dismal King.
I came from another world in search
of captivating darkness. Who are you?

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text: I'm Scarecrow. But as for why I'm a scarecrow, I have no earthly idea! Also, I don't know anything about this 'captivating darkness' you're on about. But the humans might have an idea, so why not head over to the airship?

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Let us accompany this bizarre
Scarecrow to the airship.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
I will aid Warrior with
his atonement.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Escort me to this airship of which you
speak, for I know nothing of this world.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Oh, I'd be delighted! I'm bored to tears
with all this standing around. Follow me!

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Perhaps you might be able to carry out
your atonement at this airship, Warrior.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Ilmurran_Einherjar
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
I can only pray that turns out to be true,
no matter what it might entail.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FIRSTSTOP_000_C.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FIRSTSTOP_000_C.text:
And there you are!
One airship, just as promised.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FIRSTSTOP_000_C.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FIRSTSTOP_000_C.text:
The speed at which this quicksand moves
will make crossing it quite the ordeal.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FIRSTSTOP_000_C.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FIRSTSTOP_000_C.text:
Oh, right! In that case,
I know where we should go.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.text:
I assume we do something
with this machine.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.text:
Hello, Spookcrow. I'd like you to change
the flow of the sand, if you would.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.speaker: Spookcrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.text:
YO, SCARECROW! BEEN A HOT MINUTE, BUDDY!
ALSO, WHY ARE YOU WANDERING ALL OVER FROM
HELL TO BREAKFAST WITH THIS HUMAN, HUH!?

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.text:
You can change the flow
of the sands, then?

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.speaker: Spookcrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.text:
ME? NAH! I CAN'T DO SQUAT, BUDDY!
BUT THE ROBOT CAN!

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.text:
Must you shriek all your
words like a bedlamite?

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.speaker: Spookcrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.text:
SORRY ABOUT THAT! THIS IS JUST THE NATURAL
VOLUME FOR ME! NOW HANG ON AND I'LL GET
THAT SAND CHANGED FOR YOU, BUDDY!

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.text: We should be able to proceed now.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
This is the airship, then? It looks to
have served its purpose as a vessel,
but your statement earlier seemed
to suggest people now live here.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text: Oh sure! Lots of 'em!

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
At last, a place to rest.
No sand will breach this area.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
I say, who are you!?
Did you come from the outside!?

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
I am Siugnas, the Dismal King.
Clearly you receive few visitors
from other worlds here.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
We get none at all, in fact! Hmm... But since
you are clearly standing here now, it could
mean the legend of Pandora is real! You must tell me everything
you know about Pandora!

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text: No. You must look into my eyes and breathe deep of the Dismal King.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Take a deep breath...
In...and out...

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
In...and out... Okay, I'm calm now.
Sorry for getting worked up like that.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
I'm the Professor, and I'm researching the history
of the Crowrealm. Though a desert now, this land
once had something called an 'ocean,' and this
very airship once soared through the skies.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Alas, now the world is nothing but sand,
and the airships lie in pieces on the ground.
And what is the cause of this misery, you ask?
The answer to that...is said to be Pandora!

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text: Tell me more of Pandora.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text: This world has a legend about an object called Pandora's Box. Tales say that opening the box was forbidden, yet an outsider came and did so regardless. This released all manner of calamities into the world, turning it to ruin—but the legend goes on to say the person to close the box again will also be an outsider!

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Oh, how I hope the legend is a lie. If it's true,
it means our world is held sway by the whims
of outsiders! And in that case, what are the
rest of us even worth?

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text: Right? What's my worth?

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
This box may lead me to the darkness
I seek. Tell me where I might find it.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
It's just a legend, friend. Nothing more.
Do you intend to blindly follow it?

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
The Dismal King blindly follows nothing.
But if Pandora's Box is the key to
plunging the world further into the
dark, I would learn more of it.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text: I don't know if I should call you an oddity or a nosy parker... Are all people from the outside like you? Er, anyway. Be that all as it may, I sadly have no idea where Pandora is. You'll just have to find it yourself.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Ooo, ooo! I know where it is!
It could be here. Or there.
Or way out there someplace.
Could be anywhere, really!

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Let me leave you with this warning:
Do not make friends with the scarecrows.
They're all irresponsible oafs to the last,
just like this straw-headed ninny here.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text: Were you responsible for making them?

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Perish the thought! If I had to guess,
I imagine they came from Pandora itself.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
We can enter this machine.
Come, Scarecrow.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Sorrowcrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
Alas, it's but a den of fiends inside!
You're better off staying here.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
Yeah, probably no point to it.
Also, hey, Sorrowcrow. Been a while.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
I would have thought this a difficult
environment for fiends to survive.
Do they come from Pandora as well?

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Sorrowcrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
Woe, but those things have always been here!
Honestly, I've no idea if they're older
than Pandora or not.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text: Very well. Let us look inside.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
Pandora is clearly not here.
Take me elsewhere.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Sorrowcrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
Alas, what misery! However, I can
at least change the flow of sand now
that those horrid fiends are gone.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
I will return when your services
again prove necessary.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_TANK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_TANK_000_CUT_00.text:
That is a weapon made by humans.
And as we know not what form Pandora
takes, this could well be it.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_TANK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_TANK_000_CUT_00.text:
Give me a straight answer, creature.
Is this Pandora or no?

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_TANK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_TANK_000_CUT_00.text:
I fear everything good Strangecrow here says
always means both 'yes' and 'no.' My advice is
to just interpret his answers however you like.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_TANK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_TANK_000_CUT_00.text:
Then this is not Pandora, for I have
no wish to find such a thing so easily.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text:
Can this machine also change
the flow of the sands?

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text:
It is fascinating how these devices change
the flow of sands despite their distance.
Do you know how they work?

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Smilecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text:
What a silly thing to ask a scarecrow!
Aha! Aha ha ha ha ha!

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text:
I should have expected as much from
a mere bag. I take it your answer to
my query is no, then?

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Smilecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text:
What a silly thing to ask a scarecrow!
Aha! Aha ha ha ha ha!

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text:
Then at least tell me why there is
always a scarecrow next to the robots.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Smilecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text:
What a silly thing to ask a scarecrow!
Aha! Aha ha ha ha ha!

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_HUMANOID_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_HUMANOID_000_CU.text:
This machine doesn't appear to be Pandora,
but I wonder if it can change the direction
of the sands.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_HUMANOID_000_CU.speaker: Sweetcrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_HUMANOID_000_CU.text:
Sand? Awww, that's easy! ♥
Also, heya, baby! ♥

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_HUMANOID_000_CU.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_HUMANOID_000_CU.text: Hi, Sweetcrow! Nice to see you.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_HUMANOID_000_CU.speaker: Sweetcrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_HUMANOID_000_CU.text:
You just ask for whatever you want, boo. ♥
There's nothing a scarecrow can't do! ♥

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_HUMANOID_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_HUMANOID_000_CU.text:
Then tell me where I might find
an enthralling being worth making
a part of the Dismal King.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_HUMANOID_000_CU.speaker: Sweetcrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_HUMANOID_000_CU.text:
What you're looking for lives in the ♥s
of all scarecrows...and you're totally
welcome to take my ♥ home, lover boy! ♥

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_HUMANOID_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_HUMANOID_000_CU.text: You do not meet my standards.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
Don't think I know you, friend.
Are you another junker?

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
I am no junker. I am the Dismal King.
I have come to this land in search
of captivating darkness.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
Well now, that's an odd thing to be seeking.
I mostly look for gears and engine parts
and showerheads and... Well, you know.
Things people want.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
This place is a veritable mountain of treasure,
but because of that, I have a bunch of scoundrels
in here bugging me. ...See?

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
They've been fighting a war ever since
Pandora opened up—even though the
world's like it is and no one has any
clue what the war is for anymore. Hell, I don't even know if we're supposed
to destroy this place or protect it.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
This is a submarine:
protector of the ocean.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
If you would wipe them out for your own
gain, the Dismal King will assist you.
Otherwise, I suggest you leave them be.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
You'd do that for me?
It'd be much appreciated,
but what do YOU gain from it?

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
You're not even sure and you'd do it anyway?
Hey, I respect that. I mean, it's not a real
treasure hunt if you know for sure what
you're going to get in the end, am I right?

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
This is the last place remaining.
I hope we find Pandora here.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text: I sure hope so!

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Engineer
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
Are you people nuts? What are you doing
here? The robots will tear you to shreds
if they find you! Okay, let's back up. I'm the Engineer,
and I'm looking for a way to turn
the tide of this war in our favor.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
I am Siugnas, the Dismal King.
I come in search of Pandora.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Engineer
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
Pandora, eh? Yes, I've heard the rumors:
Close the box and poof! The war is over.
Honestly, I have doubts that something
so convenient actually exists.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Engineer
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
Still, war robots continue to be produced
in this place, as you've no doubt seen.
So if Pandora is anywhere, it's likely here.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text: There is something here, then?

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Engineer
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
Who knows? Heck, maybe you'll even find the person
who opened Pandora in the first place! But if they were
human like us and somehow managed to survive this
long, they'd be a monster in their own right.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text: Then let's go hunt a monster!

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
Mmm. Clearly vast numbers of machines
were once manufactured here.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Engineer
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text: No, listen. Something is still operational around here.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text: Hey, look! Monsters over that way.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
This machine is still active.
What is its purpose?

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text: Sand. It's making sand.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Engineer
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
You scarecrows are all the same:
liars to the last.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
That is no sand. Those are tiny robots.
I see now the truth of the sand covering 
this world: all of it was manufactured here.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Engineer
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text: ...Pretty sure it's just sand. But even if it was robots, what good would that do us?

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text: The machines in the desert controlled the flow of sand a significant distance away. In other words, they gave orders to it. This is Pandora's true identity.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Engineer
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
Okay, let's say you're correct, and the robots
covered the world in sand to win the war.
The war is over now, but the sand remains.
So how are we supposed to remove it?

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
So long as your world remains bound by
the vast being that is Pandora, you will
not be able to create any new darkness—
and this angers the Dismal King! So I will see to your problem.
After that, all is up to you.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
Sand's coming. Oh, and it's taken the
form of a fiend, so look out for that!

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
There is no end to these sand fiends.
I find it most vexing.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Engineer
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
Well, we won't solve this problem with
tired brains. How about I keep watch
for a bit while you rest?

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text: Ho, friend! Find any treasure?

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text: Nope!

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
Well, everything good is buried beneath
the sand, so all you need to find it is
a little luck...and a secret weapon.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
My little friend here can find all sorts
of things buried in the sand. Poor thing managed to survive the war,
but can't seem to put it behind him.
Hoping this little treasure hunt of yours
can help him move past it for good.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
So the treasure we seek is a means to
defeat Pandora? Mmm. This makes sense.
What is your name, creature?

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Sarab
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text: Sarab.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text: Serve me well, Sarab.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text: Affirmative.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FERRY_END_000_C.speaker: Engineer
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FERRY_END_000_C.text:
Did you figure out a way
to fight the sand yet?

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FERRY_END_000_C.speaker: Engineer
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FERRY_END_000_C.text:
It stopped... You did it!
You closed Pandora.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FERRY_END_000_C.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FERRY_END_000_C.text:
Your treasure hunt was a success,
I take it? Excellent!

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FERRY_END_000_C.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FERRY_END_000_C.text:
Well done! Now it's our turn to
show our worth: we're going to turn
the Crowrealm into a world of sky
and water and green once more!

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FERRY_END_000_C.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FERRY_END_000_C.text: So what's that mean for me?

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
This is the wreck of a winged ship.
Were wings so small really enough
to keep it aloft?

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
...Mmm? What is that? It is no human,
nor is it a fiend. It is instead some
creature with a bag for a head.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Oh, I'm a talker, all right!
Haven't seen a human out this way
in quite a few days, though. So where'd you come from?
Cruise ship? Battleship? Submarine?

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
I am Siugnas, the Dismal King.
I came from another world in search
of captivating darkness. Who are you?

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text: I'm Scarecrow. But as for why I'm a scarecrow, I have no earthly idea! Also, I don't know anything about this 'captivating darkness' you're on about. But the humans might have an idea, so why not head over to the airship?

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Let us accompany this bizarre
Scarecrow to the airship.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Escort me to this submarine of which you
speak, for I know nothing of this world.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Oh, I'd be delighted! I'm bored to tears
with all this standing around. Follow me.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Perhaps you might be able to carry out
your atonement at this submarine, Warrior.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_FIRSTSTOP_000_C.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_FIRSTSTOP_000_C.text:
And there you are!
One submarine, just as promised.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_FIRSTSTOP_000_C.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_FIRSTSTOP_000_C.text:
The speed at which this quicksand moves
will make crossing it quite the ordeal.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_FIRSTSTOP_000_C.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_FIRSTSTOP_000_C.text:
Oh, right! In that case,
I know where we should go.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_HUMANOID_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_HUMANOID_000_CU.text:
Quite the giant machine.
I wonder if it still moves.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_HUMANOID_000_CU.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_HUMANOID_000_CU.text:
Hello, Sweetcrow. I'd like you to change
the flow of the sand, if you would.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_HUMANOID_000_CU.speaker: Sweetcrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_HUMANOID_000_CU.text:
Scarecrow, baby! Good to see you! ♥
And sure, that's an easy ask. ♥

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_HUMANOID_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_HUMANOID_000_CU.text:
You can change the flow
of the sands, then?

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_HUMANOID_000_CU.speaker: Sweetcrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_HUMANOID_000_CU.text:
Not me, hot stuff. But the robot can! ♥
Go on now, big guy! ♥

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_HUMANOID_000_CU.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_HUMANOID_000_CU.text: We should be able to proceed now.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
This is the airship, then? It looks
to be in rather sad shape, but your
statement earlier seemed to suggest
that people now live here.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
Excellent! There is no sand here.
Let us brush what remains from
ourselves and take our ease.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
Well, well! Not often we see outsiders
around these parts. Who might you be?

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
I am Siugnas, the Dismal King.
I came from another world in
search of captivating darkness.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
Oh, joy. Another weirdo. Well, as you can see,
the Crowrealm has been devastated by war.
Also, we've got darkness everywhere, but you'll
have to decide if it's captivating or not.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
True darkness is not simply lying about.
It is concealed in the hearts of people.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
Well, you'll find plenty of people like
that here; can't live in this world without
having at least a bit of darkness in you.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.text: Now that does sound compelling. I would very much like to see the darkness in your heart, as well.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
Hey, we all want things, buddy.
But people don't generally show stuff
they're embarrassed about to others—
especially when they're as shady as you. Still, if you really are looking for
darkness because you're the 'Dismal King'
or whatever, you should go find Pandora.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
The box said to have filled the
outside world with calamities?

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
You're surprisingly knowledgeable about it.
Must've gotten your world too, am I right?
Guess that explains why you're searching
for darkness—and why you're so nuts.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
Well, it can't be long now until this whole
world is devoured by Pandora, so I very
much hope you're able to locate it.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
Then you know not where
it might be found?

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.text: Ooo, but I know where it is! It could be here. Or there. Or way out that way someplace. Could be anywhere, really!

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
Wiser words were never spoken. Look,
just have Scarecrow take you where
you want to go; that's his job.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_TANK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_TANK_000_CUT_00.text:
That is a weapon made by humans.
And as we know not what form Pandora
takes, this could well be it.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_TANK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_TANK_000_CUT_00.text:
Give me a straight answer, creature.
Is this Pandora or no?

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_TANK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_TANK_000_CUT_00.text:
I fear everything good Strangecrow here says
always means both 'yes' and 'no.' My advice is
to just interpret his answers however you like.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_TANK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_TANK_000_CUT_00.text:
Then this is not Pandora, for I have
no wish to find such a thing so easily.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
We can enter this machine.
Come, Scarecrow.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Sorrowcrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
Alas, it's but a den of fiends inside!
You're better off staying here.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
Yeah, probably no point to it.
Also, hey, Sorrowcrow. Been a while.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
I would have thought this a difficult
environment for fiends to survive.
Do they come from Pandora as well?

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Sorrowcrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
Woe, but those things have always been here!
Honestly, I've no idea if they're older
than Pandora or not.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text: Very well. Let us look inside.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
Pandora is not here.
Take me elsewhere.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Sorrowcrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
Alas, what misery! However, I can
at least change the flow of sand now
that those horrid fiends are gone.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
I will return when your services
again prove necessary.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text:
Can this machine also change
the flow of the sands?

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text:
It is fascinating how these devices change
the flow of sands despite their distance.
Do you know how they work?

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Smilecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text:
What a silly thing to ask a scarecrow!
Aha! Aha ha ha ha ha!

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text:
I should have expected as much from
a mere bag. I take it your answer to
my query is no, then?

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Smilecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text:
What a silly thing to ask a scarecrow!
Aha! Aha ha ha ha ha!

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text:
Then at least tell me why there is
always a scarecrow next to the robots.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Smilecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text:
What a silly thing to ask a scarecrow!
Aha! Aha ha ha ha ha!

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.text:
This machine doesn't appear to be Pandora,
but I wonder if it can change the direction
of the sands.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.speaker: Spookcrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.text:
I CAN DO ANYTHING, BUDDY!
I'M A FREAKIN' SCARECROW!

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.text:
Hello, Spookcrow. Think you could
turn the volume down to a dull roar?

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.text:
Then tell me where I might find
captivating beings to make as one
with the Dismal King.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.text:
You won't find anyone more captivating
than a scarecrow, which means you're 
looking for ME, buddy!

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Engineer
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
Are you people nuts? What are you doing
here? The robots will tear you to shreds
if they find you! Okay, let's back up. I'm the Engineer,
and I'm looking for a way to turn
the tide of this war in our favor.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
I am Siugnas, the Dismal King.
We are here in search of Pandora.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Engineer
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
Well, war robots continue to be produced
in this place, so if Pandora is real,
this makes as much sense as anywhere.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
Speaking of which, we've got
a war robot incoming!

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text: That was far too weak to be Pandora.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Engineer
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
Yes, I suppose it was a little pathetic
for an immortal war machine. You'll likely
have to keep searching somewhere else.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
This looks to be the
wreckage of a ship.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text: Could be Pandora, yep!

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Wiseman
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text: This is Pandora.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text: You know this for certain?

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Wiseman
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text: I am the Wiseman. I know all.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Then why do you not attempt to do anything
about Pandora? I would have thought anyone
of this world would want to see it closed
and peace restored.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Wiseman
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
I am the Wiseman. Knowledge alone
is satisfaction enough.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
How regrettable that you fail to
realize your potential. I am leaving.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text: We're leaving!

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
The inside looks as badly
damaged as the outside.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text: Sure does!

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Wiseman
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text: And yet, I hear a sound.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
I did not expect you to come with us,
for did you not say knowledge alone
is satisfaction enough for you?

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Wiseman
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
I do not know what lies inside.
Therefore, I must learn.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Then tell us all you know
about Pandora.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Wiseman
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Pandora is sand. Pandora creates the sand.
It buries this world in mountains of sand,
causing it to suffocate.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Then all we need do is stop it from
producing sand? A trifling task!
How do we go about it?

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Wiseman
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text: That I do not know.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Mmm. Then I look forward
to finding out.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text: Oh yeah, can't wait!

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
The sand is fiends.
The fiends are sand.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text: Yet this is no ordinary sand.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Wiseman
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Pandora controls the sand. Every grain is
a perfect miniature recreation of Pandora.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Now I finally understand how it is possible
to change the direction of the sands:
Pandora is capable of controlling each
individual grain like its own limb. This means all we need do is sever its
control of the sand, for the grains will
be powerless without orders.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Engineer
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Sounds like you found Pandora.
So what happens now?

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Though we understand what Pandora is,
we do not yet know how to defeat it.
I am giving much thought to the problem.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Engineer
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text: Why not try this thing?

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Engineer
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
I went ahead and fixed it up earlier.
I think it's some kind of search mech?

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text: Fascinating. Let us make the attempt.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text: And we're off.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_END_000.speaker: Wiseman
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_END_000.text: The time to battle Pandora has come.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_END_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_END_000.text:
I will show you a whole
new world, Wiseman.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_END_000.speaker: Wiseman
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_END_000.text:
The sand has stopped.
Pandora has been sealed.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_END_000.speaker: Engineer
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_END_000.text: Can't believe you managed to find Pandora and close it... Who are you, anyway?

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_END_000.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_END_000.text: Just some weirdo from a cult—but hey, it takes all kinds to save the world. Speaking of which, it's time for you to get back and save your own world, yes?

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_END_000.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_END_000.text: I want to save worlds too!

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_END_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_END_000.text: You can save it from here.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
A ship in a sea of sand. Mmm.
Perhaps this was once a world
of water, but this vessel looks
to have served its purpose now.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
Mmm? What is that thing with a bag over
its head, and why is it staring at me?

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
You can speak, I see. I am Siugnas,
the Dismal King, and I am here
in search of captivating darkness.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
Hello! I'm Scarecrow, and I've been standing
here for three thousand days waiting for
someone like you to come by. Boy, this is
a real glorious moment for me!

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
Why were you so resolved to wait?
Are you the caretaker of this area?

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
Nah, I just really like talking to people—
which is why I'm so happy to have met you!
So where'd you come from? The airship?
The battleship? The cruise ship?

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
I suppose I should ask this bizarre
creature for a tour of the world.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
I know nothing of your world, bagman,
and demand that you show me around.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
Hey, I'd be happy to! I was getting bored
of standing around in the same spot anyway,
so I'll guide you on your journey to find
a bunch of captivating stuff.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
I know not where we should be heading,
but let us try to find a place where you
can complete your atonement, Warrior.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_FIRSTSTOP_000_C.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_FIRSTSTOP_000_C.text:
And there you are!
One cruise ship, just as promised.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_FIRSTSTOP_000_C.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_FIRSTSTOP_000_C.text:
The speed at which this quicksand moves
will make crossing it quite the ordeal.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_FIRSTSTOP_000_C.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_FIRSTSTOP_000_C.text:
Oh, right! In that case,
I know where we should go.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_TANK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_TANK_000_CUT_00.text:
A human weapon. I don't believe
it will be moving anytime soon.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_TANK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_TANK_000_CUT_00.text:
Hello, Strangecrow! I'd like you to change
the flow of the sand, if you would.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_TANK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_TANK_000_CUT_00.text:
Then you can change the
direction of the sands?

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_TANK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_TANK_000_CUT_00.text:
I fear everything good Strangecrow here says
always means both 'yes' and 'no.' My advice is
to just interpret his answers however you like.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_TANK_000_CUT_01.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_TANK_000_CUT_01.text: We should be able to proceed now.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
These are the remnants of a ship.
Will I find the darkness I seek here?

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
Dunno if you'll find any darkness,
but you'll find lots of people!

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
There do indeed seem to be
people living here.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Engineer
Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
I am no wire salesman.
I am the Dismal King. I have come here seeking something or
someone that might captivate my interest.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Engineer
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
You're not a junkman? Bah. Well, I'm an
engineer, and I have no interest in abstract
nonsense like 'captivating interest.'

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
Regardless, tell me what is the most
captivating being in this world.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Engineer
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
Not a very high bar in a world that's
nothing but desert, but I suppose that
would be Pandora.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
Mmm. The box from whence countless
disasters sprung, if I recall.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Engineer
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
In this world, Pandora is real. It is Pandora
that plunged this place into war and ruin,
and the horror of that continues to this day. So if we hope to free ourselves from all of
this someday, we must find a way to survive
and close Pandora once and for all.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
If it really did bring darkness to
this world, I must see it at once.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
That I have not decided; I must first
examine it and see if it fascinates me.
Now tell me where to find it.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Engineer
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
I have no idea where Pandora is.
I suggest you ask a scarecrow.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text: You. Tell me where Pandora is.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
Of course! You simply go this way,
then that way, then some way!

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text: One trip to Pandora, coming up!

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text:
Another giant machine.
Could this be Pandora?

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text: I assume that means it isn't?

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Smilecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text:
What a silly thing to ask a scarecrow!
Aha! Aha ha ha ha ha!

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Smilecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text:
What a silly thing to ask a scarecrow!
Aha! Aha ha ha ha ha!

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Smilecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text:
What a silly thing to ask a scarecrow!
Aha! Aha ha ha ha ha!

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.text:
Can this machine also change
the flow of the sands?

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.speaker: Spookcrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.text:
I CAN DO ANYTHING, BUDDY!
I'M A FREAKIN' SCARECROW!

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.text:
Hello, Spookcrow. Think you could
turn the volume down to a dull roar?

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.text:
Then tell me where I might find something
or someone that will capture my interest.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
We can enter this machine.
Come, Scarecrow.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Sorrowcrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
Alas, it's but a den of fiends inside!
You're better off staying here.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
Yeah, probably no point to it.
Also, hey, Sorrowcrow. Been a while.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
I would have thought this a difficult
environment for fiends to survive.
Do they come from Pandora as well?

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Sorrowcrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
Woe, but those things have always been here!
Honestly, I've no idea if they're older
than Pandora or not.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text: Very well. Let us look inside.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
Pandora is not here.
Take me elsewhere.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Sorrowcrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
Now that the fiends are gone,
I have been given a new power.
O woe! Woe and calamity!

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text: Use it well, you pitiful creature.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_HUMANOID_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_HUMANOID_000_CU.text:
Can this machine also change
the flow of the sands?

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_HUMANOID_000_CU.speaker: Sweetcrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_HUMANOID_000_CU.text:
Sand? Awww, that's easy! ♥
Also, heya, baby! ♥

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_HUMANOID_000_CU.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_HUMANOID_000_CU.text: Hello, Sweetcrow. Nice to see you.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_HUMANOID_000_CU.speaker: Sweetcrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_HUMANOID_000_CU.text:
You just ask for whatever you want, boo. ♥
There's nothing a scarecrow can't do! ♥

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_HUMANOID_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_HUMANOID_000_CU.text:
Then tell me where I might find something
or someone that will capture my interest.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_HUMANOID_000_CU.speaker: Sweetcrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_HUMANOID_000_CU.text:
Sure thing, sweet cheeks! ♥ Just ask
yourself this: what's the most special-est
place in the entire Crowrealm, hmm? ♥
Here's a hint: it's not some dumb robot! ♥

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
This looks to be the
wreckage of a ship.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Wiseman
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text: I am the Wiseman. I know all.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Mmm. I expected a good deal
more from Pandora.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Wiseman
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Did I not just tell you
this is not Pandora?

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Then where do I find
the actual Pandora?

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Very well. I'm sure we will
discover it in due time.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Wiseman
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
And just what do you plan to do
once you actually find Pandora!?

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
This is the only place
we have yet to look.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
I say, who are you!?
Did you come from the outside!?

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
I am Siugnas. I came from another world
seeking captivating darkness, and to that
end am currently searching for Pandora.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
So the legends are true—an outsider will
open Pandora, and an outsider will close it!
Is this prophecy? An accurate prediction?
A cleverly executed program? Whatever it may be, one thing is certain:
history will now begin to move.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Yes, well, introductions! I'm the Professor,
and I'm researching the Crowrealm's history.
I've spent hour after endless hour in this place,
but today, you will put an end to that!

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
You seem oddly willing to place trust in me.
No other outsider has succeeded in closing it,
so what makes you so certain I will succeed?

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
I don't know. No one has ever seen Pandora—
and even if it IS in here, I can't go in on my own.
I guess something just convinced me that you're
going to be the one.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text: Then I shall move out.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text: Movin' out!

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
I am convinced Pandora is here,
yet see no signs of it.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Pandora's secrets lie deeper within.
Let's go, so I might witness history!

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text: Deeper within!

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text: Moving sand... So this is the truth of Pandora? It's just digging up sand from somewhere and scattering it all across our world? Absurd! Ridiculous! Complete and utter rot! I can't believe we let all time come to a standstill because we were afraid of this!

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text: This isn't sand—it's robots!

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Ah, so all the sand in this world is
actually machines? That explains why
its flow can be changed.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text: I fear I don't understand.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
We are currently surrounded by countless
sand machines. Either we get rid of them,
or you perish. Those are our only options.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text: Gya! I don't want to perish!

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text: We made it!

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Each of our individual foes is weak,
but they strike us in irksome numbers.
It is quite the predicament.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
You can do it! That's why the legend says
you will be the one to close Pandora!

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Nothing is beyond the Dismal King!
Yet we will require a strategy
if we are to be successful.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text: We sure will!

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Wiseman
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
You will need power equal to Pandora's
own if you wish to fight it and win.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text: Tell me all you know.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Wiseman
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Use this. It hates Pandora, and may prove
a great aid in your upcoming fight.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Wiseman
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text: Hate begets nothing!

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Wrong. Hate is a fearsome power.
Now tell me of yourself, creature.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Sarab
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text: Sarab will kill Pandora.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text: Excellent!

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text: Where are you going?

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text: Where are you going?

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_END_000.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_END_000.text:
The time has come at last... Oh, to think
I might witness a turning point in history
with my own eyes.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_END_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_END_000.text:
You shall, unless you foolishly
choose to avert your gaze.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_END_000.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_END_000.text:
Can you believe it!? I was actually able
to experience the moment a legend
became reality! I was right to put
my faith in you after all.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_END_000.speaker: Engineer
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_END_000.text:
You did it! You actually closed Pandora!
Ha ha haaaa... Hey, wait. What the heck are
we supposed to do with the rest of our lives?

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_END_000.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_END_000.text: Yeah, what should I do with my life?

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
A ship in a sea of sand. Mmm.
Perhaps this was once a world of
water, but this vessel looks to have
outlived its purpose now.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
Mmm? What is that thing with a bag over
its head, and why is it staring at me?

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
Actually, this place was already
a ruin when I got here!

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
You can speak, I see. I am Siugnas,
the Dismal King. Explain now why
you wear a bag on your head.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
I'm Scarecrow! I don't know why I look
like this, or even where I came from!

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
Mmm. Is everyone in this world like you?
For I have come here to search for beings
that capture my interest.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
No idea. You should try asking
around! C'mon, let's go!

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_FIRSTSTOP_000_C.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_FIRSTSTOP_000_C.text:
And there you are!
One battleship, just as promised.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_FIRSTSTOP_000_C.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_FIRSTSTOP_000_C.text:
The speed at which this sand moves
will make crossing it quite the ordeal.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_FIRSTSTOP_000_C.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_FIRSTSTOP_000_C.text:
Oh, right! In that case,
I know where we should go.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Smilecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text:
What a silly thing to ask a scarecrow!
Aha! Aha ha ha ha ha!

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text:
Hello, Smilecrow. I'd like you to change
the flow of the sand, if you would.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: 綱紀
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text:
Aha ha ha ha ha! Scarecrow?
Aha ha ha ha ha! The flow of sand?

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text:
You can change the flow
of the sands, then?

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Smilecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text:
What a silly thing to ask a scarecrow!
Aha! Aha ha ha ha ha!

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Smilecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text: The flow of sand! Aha ha ha ha!

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text: We should be able to proceed now.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
This must be the battleship. Much like
the ship earlier, it looks very old.
You say we will find people inside?

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Oh, there's people, all right!
Just no one captivating!

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Excellent! There is no sand here.
Let us brush what remains from
ourselves and take our ease.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Wiseman
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
The arrival of souls from the
outside world is an omen.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
How did you know I am
not of this world?

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Wiseman
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text: I am the Wiseman. I know all.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Mmm. Then tell me where I might find
someone worthy of becoming one with
the Dismal King.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Wiseman
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text: Looking to get married, are you?

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Wiseman
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Don't look at me like that! You're the one
who came at me with a bizarre question—
can't blame me for not having the answer. Now let me proclaim your fate to you,
outsider. You will find Pandora inside
the submarine. What happens after that—
and on the way—it is up to you.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.text:
This machine does not capture
my interest at all.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.text:
Hello, Spookcrow. Think you could
turn the volume down to a dull roar?

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.text:
Then tell me where I might find something
or someone that will capture my interest.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
We can enter this machine.
Come along.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Sorrowcrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
Alas, it's but a den of fiends inside!
You're better off staying here.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
Yeah, probably no point to it.
Also, hey, Sorrowcrow. Been a while.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
I would have thought this a difficult
environment for fiends to survive.
Do they come from Pandora as well?

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Sorrowcrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
Woe, but those things have always been here!
Honestly, I've no idea if they're older
than Pandora or not.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text: Very well. Let us look inside.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
I will find nothing to captivate me
in this place. Take me elsewhere.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Sorrowcrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
Alas, what misery! However, I can
at least change the flow of sand now
that those horrid fiends are gone.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
I will return when your services
again prove necessary.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_HUMANOID_000_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_HUMANOID_000_CU.text:
I cannot help but be slightly
captivated by its size.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_HUMANOID_000_CU.speaker: Sweetcrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_HUMANOID_000_CU.text:
What's this about being
captivating, now? ♥

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_HUMANOID_000_CU.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_HUMANOID_000_CU.text: Hello, Sweetcrow. Nice to see you.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_HUMANOID_000_CU.speaker: Sweetcrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_HUMANOID_000_CU.text:
What's the most special-est place in the
entire Crowrealm, hmm? ♥ Here's a hint:
it's not some dumb robot! ♥

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_TANK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_TANK_000_CUT_00.text:
A human-made weapon? I doubt
I can make this part of myself.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_TANK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_TANK_000_CUT_00.text:
You think it possible, then?
Or do I misunderstand?

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_TANK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_TANK_000_CUT_00.text:
I can't imagine you have any
darkness within you, either.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_TANK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_TANK_000_CUT_00.text:
I fear everything good Strangecrow here says
always means both 'yes' and 'no.' My advice is
to just interpret his answers however you like.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_TANK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_TANK_000_CUT_00.text: He is clearly not what I seek.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
This is the wreck of a winged ship.
Were wings so small really enough
to keep it aloft?

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
I say, who are you!?
Did you come from the outside!?

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
I did. I am Siugnas, and I am come
in search of captivating darkness.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
So you're not here to close Pandora? Blast!
Well, I am the Professor, a researcher of
the Crowrealm's history who is also seeking
a way to seal Pandora for good.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
What is this 'Pandora' I keep hearing of?
The Wiseman told me it was my destiny to
visit the submarine and find it there.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
The Wiseman said that? Then you
must go to the submarine at once!
This place holds nothing for you!

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text: But we have an enemy incoming...

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Now go! Find the Junkman in the submarine,
and get his help to close Pandora.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Yet I still know not what
this 'Pandora' even is.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Very well. If nothing else, it will
make this journey entertaining.
Let us head to the submarine.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
This must be the submarine where
we will supposedly find 'Pandora.'

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
Ah! An outsider has arrived, just as the
Wiseman foretold. He also claimed that the
closing of Pandora was all in your hands.
So then...will you close it?

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
First, tell me what 'Pandora' is.
If it captures my interest,
the Dismal King will aid you.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
Pandora is the cause of all desolation in
this world. It brought calamity to the land
and launched a war that rages to this day. And if we hope to right these most
terrible wrongs, we must close Pandora.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
I have no interest in saving the world;
I am here in search of darkness. If Pandora
allows me to fill this world with an even
greater dark, I would use it to that end.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
Yeah, you definitely don't look like the
savior type—and yet I'm somehow convinced
that you're going to do this for us and
save our world all the same.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.text: For us!

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
Determined to force your opinions on me,
are you? Very well. I can decide what to
do with this Pandora after I find it.
Perhaps I will grant your wish after all.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
There is no sign of anything resembling
Pandora here. It appears your wish will
remain unfulfilled by the Dismal King.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
Nothing yet, but the path goes on.
Now come! I know we will find it!

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.text: We'll find it!

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
There is naught but sand surrounding us,
yet you still remain convinced of Pandora's
existence? Humanity was the thing which
destroyed this world. Not Pandora.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.text: The sand... Of course! The sand is the cause of all this! The sand is Pandora! It was created here in this place, and once it spread across the Crowrealm, it sent the entire world to ruin.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.text: That is what you choose to believe?

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
Sand's coming. Oh, and it's taken the
form of a fiend, so look out for that!

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
I hear you found Pandora!
Did you manage to close it?

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
What we found was the truth: Pandora
does not exist. That is clearly what
the Wiseman meant by his words.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.text: Is this true, Junkman?

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
Seems so. If this world is going to be saved,
it will be done not by an outsider, but by
the sweat and toil of those who live here.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.text: Well, I suppose that's not so bad; the Crowrealm is our home, after all, so it's only fitting that we should be the main characters in its story. You have my thanks, friend—and I swear to you now, we will take our world back! We cannot thank you enough.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
My journey in this world is complete,
and the time has come to depart.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.text: What should I do?

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.text: Come with me.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
Take good care of your
best pal Scarecrow, okay!?

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_DIVING_010_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_DIVING_010_CUT_.text: What is the best course of action here? If every sand grain in this world is Pandora, we can't possibly fight all of them.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_DIVING_010_CUT_.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_DIVING_010_CUT_.text: You can do it. You will. The prophecy says as much.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_DIVING_010_CUT_.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_DIVING_010_CUT_.text:
Well done! I hear you found Pandora!
Did you manage to close it?

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_DIVING_010_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_DIVING_010_CUT_.text:
What we found was the truth:
Pandora is all of the grains
