of sand in this world.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_DIVING_010_CUT_.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_DIVING_010_CUT_.text:
The sand is...? But no, that can't be!
The sand isn't attacking us!

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_DIVING_010_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_DIVING_010_CUT_.text:
Ah, but they only act when ordered to do so.
If we can stop the sand from receiving orders,
it will be only sand.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_DIVING_010_CUT_.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_DIVING_010_CUT_.text:
Wonderful! Now here, take this.
He's my little helper and a good,
fine boy, and I know he'll aid you.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_DIVING_END_000_.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_DIVING_END_000_.text: You can do it. You will. The prophecy says as much.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_DIVING_END_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_DIVING_END_000_.text:
The Dismal King needs no prophecy
to know I will emerge triumphant.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_DIVING_END_000_.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_DIVING_END_000_.text:
The prophecy has been fulfilled,
and Pandora is closed at last.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_DIVING_END_000_.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_DIVING_END_000_.text:
The Crowrealm has finally been returned to us,
and from this day forward, we shall restore it
to its former glory with our own hands!

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_DIVING_END_000_.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_DIVING_END_000_.text:
I'm going to stay here and help
with the restoration.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_DIVING_END_000_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_DIVING_END_000_.text: No. You will come with me.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_000_CUT_000_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_000_CUT_000_00.text:
You are a captivating being,
and I would take you into my thrall.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_000_CUT_000_01.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_000_CUT_000_01.text: As you wish, O Dismal King.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_010_CUT_000_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_010_CUT_000_00.text:
Even if we are separated, your soul
shall always be one with my own.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_020_CUT_000_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_020_CUT_000_00.text:
You will remain here and acquire
infinite knowledge—but your soul
will come with me.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_020_CUT_000_01.speaker: Wiseman
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_KENZOKU_020_CUT_000_01.text:
I lack knowledge of the world of
darkness, and must remedy this.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FIRSTSTOP_100_C.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FIRSTSTOP_100_C.text:
This is the way to the airship,
but the sands move too quickly.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FIRSTSTOP_100_C.speaker: Ilmurran_Einherjar
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FIRSTSTOP_100_C.text: This—all of this—is completely new to me. The dunes didn't exist when I was last here, so I've got no idea how to deal with them.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FIRSTSTOP_100_C.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FIRSTSTOP_100_C.text: I can help! Let's go over there!

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FIRSTSTOP_100_C.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FIRSTSTOP_100_C.text:
I do not recall asking
for your guidance.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_100_CUT.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_100_CUT.text:
This is the airship, then? It resembles a
balloon more than any seafaring vessel,
and I am hard-pressed to imagine it once
soared majestically through the skies.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_100_CUT.speaker: Ilmurran_Einherjar
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_100_CUT.text: I remember people making small balloons that soared through the skies when I was younger, but had no idea they could be so large. How long have I been gone from this place!?

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_100_CUT.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_100_CUT.text:
Excellent! There is no sand here.
Let us brush what remains from
ourselves and take our ease.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_100_CUT.speaker: Ilmurran_Einherjar
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_100_CUT.text: Then Pandora DID cause all of this!

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_100_CUT.speaker: Ilmurran_Einherjar
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_100_CUT.text:
Oh yes. I know of Pandora.
Because I was the one who opened it.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_100_CUT.speaker: Ilmurran_Einherjar
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_100_CUT.text:
I came from a small village beset by fiends
and bandits. I didn't have the power to fight
them—none of us did—so I decided to borrow
a little from the only source I knew: Pandora.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_100_CUT.speaker: Ilmurran_Einherjar
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_100_CUT.text:
The plan worked at first, but it had the
unintended consequence of creating a new
conflict outside the village—one that soon
exploded into a war that consumed us all. The peace I'd fought so hard to achieve was
lost. Young men and women were conscripted,
harvests failed, and we all found ourselves
on the brink of starvation and death.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_100_CUT.speaker: Ilmurran_Einherjar
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_100_CUT.text:
Knowing Pandora was to blame, I tried to shut
it again, but its power had already engulfed
the whole world and I met with opposition
in vast, vast numbers.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_100_CUT.speaker: Ilmurran_Einherjar
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_100_CUT.text: I tried to shut Pandora. I failed to shut Pandora. And my actions led to the ruination of the world.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_100_CUT.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_100_CUT.text:
You're saying all of this is the result
of one person's actions? That's impossible.
Just how much power does Pandora possess?

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_100_CUT.speaker: Ilmurran_Einherjar
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_100_CUT.text:
It will grant any wish you ask of it—at least
at first. But it cares not for what happens
after that wish is granted. I knew this well,
yet chose to rely on it anyway.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_100_CUT.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_100_CUT.text:
So if you manage to close Pandora,
your atonement will be complete?

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_100_CUT.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_100_CUT.text:
I'm sorry, but I simply can't believe this.
That box was opened AGES ago, so unless
you're an ancient with a time machine,
what you're saying just doesn't add up.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_100_CUT.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_100_CUT.text:
Whatever the truth may be, our goal
must be to see Pandora shut once more.
That is the only way to address the
darkness in your heart, Warrior.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_100_CUT.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_100_CUT.text:
But how will you find it?
Does that fellow know where it is?

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_100_CUT.speaker: Ilmurran_Einherjar
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_100_CUT.text: No. I don't. I don't even know what the damnable thing looks like anymore, because it's always changing its form.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_100_CUT.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_100_CUT.text:
Walk forward without fear, Warrior.
If we follow the darkness in your heart,
it will surely lead us to what we seek.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_INDUSTRIAL_100_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_INDUSTRIAL_100_.text:
Perhaps we will find Pandora in
the darkness of this machine.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_INDUSTRIAL_100_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_INDUSTRIAL_100_.text:
Ah. A fiend nest. Did Pandora
also create these fiends?

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_INDUSTRIAL_100_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_INDUSTRIAL_100_.text: Mmm. Then let us look inside.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_INDUSTRIAL_100_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_INDUSTRIAL_100_.text: We will not find Pandora here.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_TANK_100_CUT_00.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_TANK_100_CUT_00.text:
This is a weapon made by humans. But if
Pandora is capable of changing its form,
this could very well be it.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_HUMANOID_100_CU.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_HUMANOID_100_CU.text:
This machine doesn't appear to be Pandora,
but perhaps it can change the direction
of the sand all the same.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_DIVING_100_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_DIVING_100_CUT_.text:
I am Siugnas, the Dismal King, and you
will address me as such. We are here
in search of Pandora.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_DIVING_100_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_DIVING_100_CUT_.text:
A query, Warrior: I fail to see how wishing
for the safety of your village alone would
lead to a conflict that engulfed the world.
Did you actually wish for something else?

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_DIVING_100_CUT_.speaker: Ilmurran_Einherjar
Ilmurran_Einherjar
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_DIVING_100_CUT_.text:
I should have closed the box sooner—I know
that now. That action alone would have kept
my village safe, just as I wished. So you see, this isn't Pandora's fault—
it's my own for being so damn selfish!

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_DIVING_100_CUT_.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_DIVING_100_CUT_.text:
But do you REALLY think you
can find and close Pandora!? No, I suppose it's better if you don't know.
After all, the most enjoyable treasure hunts
are the ones when you don't know if you'll be
successful. Now good luck out there!

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FERRY_100_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FERRY_100_CUT_0.text:
The darkness within you led us here, Warrior,
which means here is where we find Pandora.
Are you prepared to face it?

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FERRY_100_CUT_0.speaker: Ilmurran_Einherjar
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FERRY_100_CUT_0.text:
I'm terrified. The fact Pandora has grown
this large means the darkness within me is
equally as large, right? Clearly I have no
idea just how deep that darkness runs.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FERRY_100_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FERRY_100_CUT_0.text:
I am Siugnas, the Dismal King.
We come in search of Pandora.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FERRY_100_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FERRY_100_CUT_0.text:
Such pitiful robots are no match for us.
Pandora is clearly further inside.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FERRY_100_CUT_0.speaker: Engineer
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FERRY_100_CUT_0.text:
If you're going further inside, I'm coming.
For who knows what kinds of useful things
might be waiting in there!?

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FERRY_100_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FERRY_100_CUT_0.text:
The machines here aren't operational.
This is not Pandora.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FERRY_100_CUT_0.speaker: Ilmurran_Einherjar
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FERRY_100_CUT_0.text: It was Pandora once. But it changed the machines it produced over time, and this is what now remains.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FERRY_100_CUT_0.speaker: Engineer
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FERRY_100_CUT_0.text: Then you think we'll find a facility making even larger robots further within? A facility that is Pandora?

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FERRY_100_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FERRY_100_CUT_0.text:
Your suspicions are correct, Warrior.
The machines here are still active,
and they are making sand.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FERRY_100_CUT_0.speaker: Engineer
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FERRY_100_CUT_0.text: Are you suggesting Pandora is the reason the deserts are expanding?

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FERRY_100_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FERRY_100_CUT_0.text:
Exactly so. If Warrior is correct, 
the very grains of sand in your
desert are nothing but machines.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FERRY_100_CUT_0.speaker: Engineer
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FERRY_100_CUT_0.text:
But what would be the point of making
robots so small? They can't possibly
be used for fighting!

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FERRY_100_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FERRY_100_CUT_0.text:
They sacrificed size in favor of numbers, and their
diminutive stature allows them to infiltrate any
enemy location... A formidable strategy indeed.
And it all came to pass because of you, Warrior.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FERRY_100_CUT_0.speaker: Ilmurran_Einherjar
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FERRY_100_CUT_0.text:
Why did this happen...? All I wanted was
to protect my village by my own hand,
and now we've got robots made of sand!

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FERRY_100_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FERRY_100_CUT_0.text:
Your combat instincts gave Pandora the
knowledge it now uses here, Warrior.
Your talents are truly genius.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FERRY_100_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FERRY_100_CUT_0.text:
The time has come to make your heart's desire
come true, Warrior. Defeat the beast you created,
and protect both your village and your world
by the power of your own hand!

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FERRY_100_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FERRY_100_CUT_0.text:
As there is no limit to the number of sand
fiends Pandora can create, mere brute force
will not be enough to see your dream
through to its conclusion, Warrior.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FERRY_100_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FERRY_100_CUT_0.text:
We have found Pandora, but do not yet know
how to close it. We must learn this before
we can hope to gain the treasure we seek.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FERRY_100_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FERRY_100_CUT_0.text:
Then the way to close Pandora is also hidden
under the sand? Ah, but this is a treasure
hunt for true! Now then, I would have your name.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FERRY_END_100_C.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FERRY_END_100_C.text:
The time is finally upon us
to close Pandora, Warrior.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FERRY_END_100_C.speaker: Ilmurran_Einherjar
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FERRY_END_100_C.text: Why am I shaking? Is this fear? ...No. It must be excitement! We will see Pandora closed, Count!

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FERRY_END_100_C.speaker: Ilmurran_Einherjar
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FERRY_END_100_C.text:
That it is—but alas, my village will never
return, and the restoration of the Crowrealm
will be a process long and arduous. So my atonement is not yet complete.
On the contrary, it has only just begun.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FERRY_END_100_C.speaker: Ilmurran_Einherjar
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FERRY_END_100_C.text:
So let me continue my atonement
by serving you, O Dismal King!

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FERRY_END_100_C.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FERRY_END_100_C.text: Then you shall have the brand.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FERRY_END_100_C.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FERRY_END_100_C.text:
I welcome you into my thrall, Warrior.
I now have you in my gaze at all times.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FERRY_END_100_C.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FERRY_END_100_C.text:
Your blood will become a part of me,
and will make me the Dismal King.
Together into eternity shall we live.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FERRY_END_100_C.speaker: Siugnas
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FERRY_END_100_C.text:
I appreciate the sentiment.
Let us leave it there for now.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_FIRSTSTOP_100_C.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_FIRSTSTOP_100_C.text:
This is the way to the submarine,
but the sands move too quickly.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_DIVING_100_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_DIVING_100_CUT_.text:
This submarine is smaller and rounder than
ships that sail the seas. Though it doubtless
once moved about under the water, it is now
trapped floundering on the sand.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_DIVING_100_CUT_.speaker: Ilmurran_Einherjar
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_DIVING_100_CUT_.text: I remember people going underwater in metal cans when I was younger, but had no idea they could be so large. Just how long have I been gone from this place!?

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_DIVING_100_CUT_.speaker: Ilmurran_Einherjar
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_DIVING_100_CUT_.text: Then Pandora DID cause all this!

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_DIVING_100_CUT_.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_DIVING_100_CUT_.text:
That's right—and I don't think there's
a way to stop it from swallowing up the
entire world. Surprised to hear you know
of Pandora, however.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_DIVING_100_CUT_.speaker: Ilmurran_Einherjar
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_DIVING_100_CUT_.text:
Oh, yes. I know of Pandora.
Because I was the one who opened it.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_DIVING_100_CUT_.speaker: Ilmurran_Einherjar
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_DIVING_100_CUT_.text:
I came from a small village beset by fiends
and bandits. I didn't have the power to fight
them—none of us did—so I decided to borrow
a little from the only source I knew: Pandora.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_DIVING_100_CUT_.speaker: Ilmurran_Einherjar
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_DIVING_100_CUT_.text:
The plan worked at first, but it had the
unintended consequence of creating a new
conflict outside the village—one that soon
exploded into a war that consumed us all. The peace I'd fought so hard to achieve was
lost. Young men and women were conscripted,
harvests failed, and we all found ourselves
on the brink of starvation and death.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_DIVING_100_CUT_.speaker: Ilmurran_Einherjar
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_DIVING_100_CUT_.text:
Knowing Pandora was to blame, I tried to shut
it again, but its power had already engulfed
the whole world and I met with opposition
in vast, vast numbers.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_DIVING_100_CUT_.speaker: Ilmurran_Einherjar
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_DIVING_100_CUT_.text: I tried to shut Pandora. I failed to shut Pandora. And my actions led to the ruination of the world.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_DIVING_100_CUT_.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_DIVING_100_CUT_.text:
So YOU were the one who gave us this
ruined world? No wonder the pair of you
seemed so very strange.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_DIVING_100_CUT_.speaker: Ilmurran_Einherjar
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_DIVING_100_CUT_.text:
Pandora will grant any wish you ask—at least
at first. But it cares not for what happens
after that wish is granted. I knew this well,
yet chose to rely on it anyway.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_DIVING_100_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_DIVING_100_CUT_.text:
So if you manage to close Pandora,
your atonement will be complete? Then let us set off on a journey to
close the thing, for only that will
lead us to the darkness in your heart.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_DIVING_100_CUT_.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_DIVING_100_CUT_.text:
Nice idea, but how will you find it?
Wait, dumb question. Clearly that guy
right there knows, since he's the one
who opened it to begin with.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_DIVING_100_CUT_.speaker: Ilmurran_Einherjar
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_DIVING_100_CUT_.text: Me? Ha! I don't even know what the damnable thing looks like anymore, because it's always changing its form!

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_DIVING_100_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_DIVING_100_CUT_.text:
Walk forward without fear, Warrior.
If we follow the darkness in your heart,
it will surely lead us to what we seek.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_100_CUT.speaker: Wiseman
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_100_CUT.text:
Fear not. The darkness within you cannot
grow larger than you yourself.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_100_CUT.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_100_CUT.text:
I take that to mean you know how to
close Pandora. Why do you not do so?

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_100_CUT.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_100_CUT.text:
It seems closing Pandora is your task
after all, Warrior. Let us move forward
and tackle it with gusto.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_100_CUT.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_100_CUT.text:
We have found Pandora, but lack the
knowledge to close it. We must find
some way to emerge victorious over it.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_FIRSTSTOP_100_C.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_FIRSTSTOP_100_C.text:
There looks to be something ahead,
but the flow of sand is fast enough
to impede our passing.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_FERRY_100_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_FERRY_100_CUT_0.text:
Those who are destined to die ever cling
to life, yet even this most sizeable ship
is now exposing its corpse for all to see.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_FERRY_100_CUT_0.speaker: Ilmurran_Einherjar
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_FERRY_100_CUT_0.text:
My village was quite a ways from the sea,
so this is my first time seeing a ship so large.
Brighthome wasn't home to any oceans,
as you well know.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_FERRY_100_CUT_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_FERRY_100_CUT_0.text: There are signs of life inside.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_FERRY_100_CUT_0.speaker: Engineer
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_FERRY_100_CUT_0.text:
Pandora plunged this world first into
war and then into ruin—and that is how
it remains. We who reside here must now
live on and one day see it closed.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_FERRY_100_CUT_0.speaker: Ilmurran_Einherjar
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_FERRY_100_CUT_0.text:
Yet I'm the one who opened the
door to Pandora to begin with.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_FERRY_100_CUT_0.speaker: Engineer
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_FERRY_100_CUT_0.text:
You people sure say some strange things.
Er, not that I blame you for wanting to
escape into your own reality rather than
continue in a barren wasteland like this.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_FERRY_100_CUT_0.speaker: Engineer
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_FERRY_100_CUT_0.text:
Well, I'm counting on the two of you
to close Pandora, but do you even know
where you're going to find it?

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_100_CUT.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_100_CUT.text:
Closing Pandora will be no easy task.
I feel how much pressure you're under,
but I'm convinced you'll pull through
and be the ones to finally close it.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_100_CUT.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_100_CUT.text:
If you would forge a legend, you must
first build the facts it is based on.
To that end, you require another
strategy in order to close Pandora.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_WARSHIP_100_CUT.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_WARSHIP_100_CUT.text:
This battleship has fallen to ruin, yet its
desire to cause destruction can still be felt.
What manner of people will we find in here?

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_WARSHIP_100_CUT.speaker: Ilmurran_Einherjar
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_WARSHIP_100_CUT.text: I remember being captivated by battleships like these when I was a child—I must have had a craving for power even then. Just how long have I been gone from this place!?

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_WARSHIP_100_CUT.speaker: Ilmurran_Einherjar
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_WARSHIP_100_CUT.text: Then Pandora DID cause all this!

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_WARSHIP_100_CUT.speaker: Wiseman
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_WARSHIP_100_CUT.text:
You were the one who first opened
its lid. I knew so all along.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_WARSHIP_100_CUT.speaker: Wiseman
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_WARSHIP_100_CUT.text:
You cannot atone for what is done,
but you can do new good.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_WARSHIP_100_CUT.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_WARSHIP_100_CUT.text:
Let us make for the submarine,
for there will we find Pandora.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_WARSHIP_100_CUT.speaker: Ilmurran_Einherjar
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_WARSHIP_100_CUT.text:
Pandora is constantly changing forms.
I wonder what it looks like now?

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_WARSHIP_100_CUT.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_WARSHIP_100_CUT.text:
Its current form is no doubt a
projection of the dark within you.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_AIRSHIP_100_CUT.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_AIRSHIP_100_CUT.text:
I am Siugnas, the Dismal King. I came from
another world in search of captivating
darkness, and am currently on the way
to the submarine to close Pandora.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_AIRSHIP_100_CUT.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_AIRSHIP_100_CUT.text:
You came to seal Pandora!? Excellent!
I am the Professor, a researcher of the
Crowrealm's history who is also seeking
a way to seal Pandora for good. How did you learn that Pandora is
in the submarine? Did your powers
of darkness tell you this?

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_AIRSHIP_100_CUT.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_AIRSHIP_100_CUT.text:
One calling himself the Wiseman told us
we would find it there. We will not know
if his words are true until we go there
ourselves and see, however.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_AIRSHIP_100_CUT.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_AIRSHIP_100_CUT.text:
If the Wiseman said that,
it is the truth.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_DIVING_100_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_DIVING_100_CUT_.text:
This must be the submarine.
Are you ready to face Pandora, Warrior?

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_DIVING_100_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_DIVING_100_CUT_.text:
The act of closing Pandora and atoning for
your sins will reveal the darkness in your
heart—for that was the cause of all of this,
and not Pandora itself. ...And I would see that darkness.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_DIVING_100_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_DIVING_100_CUT_.text:
You must face Pandora with that fear
in your heart. That is how I wish it
to be done.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_DIVING_100_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_DIVING_100_CUT_.text:
Look around you. Naught but sand.
You never opened anything, Warrior. Hear me, humans! There is no such thing
as Pandora! You did this to your world
with your own actions, and blamed Pandora
so you might avoid that truth!

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_DIVING_100_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_DIVING_100_CUT_.text: Your weak hearts created a darkness of almost incalculable size, and it is a thing most fascinating!

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_DIVING_100_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_DIVING_100_CUT_.text:
You had nothing to atone for, Warrior.
Yet you felt you bore a great weight
on your shoulders, which is why you
could make no amends in Brighthome.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_DIVING_100_CUT_.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_DIVING_100_CUT_.text:
And will I gain a stronger heart
if I serve you, O Dismal King?

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_DIVING_100_CUT_.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE3_DIVING_100_CUT_.text:
Heh. Good. I see you have not
changed as a result of all this.

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_RETURN_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_RETURN_000_CUT_000_000.text:
In the end, your atonement remains
incomplete. Is this acceptable?

SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_RETURN_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Ilmurran_Einherjar
SUB_W13_EVAR_SIUG_RETURN_000_CUT_000_010.text:
Yes. I managed to settle things with Pandora,
which is enough for me. Now I can finally get
back to living like I always have!
